title: The One With the Prom Video

dialogue.speaker: NOTE
dialogue.text: For this episode, I'm using italics to signify portions contained in the prom video. [

events.event_description: Joey gives Chandler an envelope as a repayment for past expenses.
Joey presents Chandler with a gaudy gold bracelet as a gift.
Chandler opens a box and reacts with surprise to a gold bracelet.
Joey encourages Chandler to wear the bracelet, claiming it goes with everything.
Chandler refuses to wear the bracelet immediately, suggesting it should be saved for a special occasion.
Joey puts the bracelet on Chandler's wrist, asserting it makes him 'good to go'.
Chandler jokes about the bracelet slowing down his sex life, then dismisses it.
Chandler and Joey discuss playing basketball, leading to an accidental lamp being knocked over.
Chandler searches his room for the missing bracelet after realizing it is gone.
Chandler and Joey reconcile when Chandler gives Joey the bracelet, affirming their friendship.
